Title: S5 Ep. 193 Marco Santana
Description: Tune in to this week's guest, Marco Santana, share why and how he got started in journalism. Worked with major newspapers and now freelances specializing in technology and game industries.  Please leave a comment and tell us why you liked the show and if you leave us a voice message for us to play it on our podcast, we will send you an Intern Pursuit game t-shirt.
